definition: to exaggerate/empty/in vain/old variant of 螗[tang2]

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: You can register as “Donald Duck” and use all personalized services.
sentences.chinese: 你可以註冊爲“唐老鴨”並使用所有個性服務。

sentences.english: My favorite character was Donald Duck.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜歡的形象是唐老鴨。

sentences.english: Who play with sand, building towers, war, and then imitate Donald Duck to say.
sentences.chinese: 誰陪我玩泥沙建鐵塔喉嚨沙，在模仿唐老鴨說的話。

sentences.english: In the meantime, the comic book remains under lock and key with the Halland police.
sentences.chinese: 在這期間，唐老鴨漫畫書仍由哈蘭警方妥善保管。

sentences.english: Donald always seems to be short of cash andmake a habit of lurching from one misadventure to thenext.
sentences.chinese: 唐老鴨看起來總缺錢花，而且習慣性地麻煩不斷。

sentences.english: In the meantime, the comic book remains under lock and key with the Halland police. (Agencies)
sentences.chinese: 在這期間，唐老鴨漫畫書仍由哈蘭警方妥善保管。

sentences.english: Donald lived in an old houseboat and wore his sailor jacket and hat.
sentences.chinese: 唐老鴨住在舊船上，穿一件海員衣，戴一頂海員帽子。

sentences.english: How do you like the cartoon film "Mickey And Mouse"?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得卡通電影“米老鼠和唐老鴨”如何？

definition: Winnie-the-Pooh (bear character in children's stories by A. A. Milne adapted by Disney)
to try to answer a question (in a quiz, guessing game, riddle etc)/quiz game
to compete to be the first to answer a question (as on a quiz show)
(bird species of China) black kite (Milvus migrans)
